import React from 'react' import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function Details({h, currentFormattedData}) { const [weatherDetails, setWeatherDetails] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { if (currentFormattedData) { const lat = currentFormattedData.lat; const lon = currentFormattedData.lon; const currentDate = new Date().toISOString(); setWeatherDetails({ temperature: currentFormattedData?.temperature, icon: currentFormattedData?.icon, time: new Date(currentFormattedData?.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }), }); } }, [currentFormattedData]); return (

{h}

{setWeatherDetails.time}
